intro: Odontostemma yulongshanense, commonly known as the Yulongshan mistflower, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its delicate, small white to pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as mountain forests. Its leaves are lance-shaped and have a slightly hairy texture. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
